quarantined_tests.reason: Spy assertion failure - expected call not received. Pre-existing regression from Oct 30 fix.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Review middleware implementation changes. Update spy expectations.

quarantined_tests.test_name: tiles can be focused and activated with keyboard
quarantined_tests.reason: Spy not called on Enter key press. handleAccess not being triggered by keyboard events.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Fix keyboard event handling in WorkspaceTile component

quarantined_tests.reason: Method configureSession() does not exist on WebRTCVoiceClient class. Tests written against API that was never implemented.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Either implement configureSession() method or rewrite tests to use sessionConfig property directly

quarantined_tests.reason: useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider. Missing AuthProvider wrapper in test setup.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Add AuthProvider wrapper to renderWithRouter test utility

quarantined_tests.reason: Multiple failures: text assertions (LISTENING..., PROCESSING...) and event handler spies not called.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Update text assertions to match current component state. Fix event handler mocking.

quarantined_tests.reason: CI-specific failure not caught locally. Component structure mismatch.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Investigate CI vs local environment differences. Update selectors.

quarantined_tests.test_name: should render checkout form and navigate on submit
quarantined_tests.reason: Unable to find element with text /checkout/i. CheckoutPage structure changed since test written.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Update selectors to match current CheckoutPage structure. Use data-testid attributes.

quarantined_tests.reason: mockNavigate never called. Navigation to /order-confirmation not triggered.
quarantined_tests.fix_strategy: Fix navigation mocking setup. Ensure form submission triggers navigation.

quarantined_tests.test_name: validates form before processing demo payment
quarantined_tests.reason: Found multiple elements with /required/i. Form validation showing multiple required fields.
